message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I think it's a fantastic opportunity for you to get your hands on this amazing product. I'm willing to offer it to you for $11,000. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to you.
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  I appreciate you considering my budget.  While I see the value in this product, I'm only able to go up to $8,500 at this time.  Let me know what you think.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand that $8,500 is a bit lower than I was hoping for, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm offering you the product for $9,500. I think this is a fair compromise considering the value it holds for you.
Alice, I appreciate you meeting me halfway, but I'm still a bit over budget. I'm happy to go up to $9,000, but that's my absolute limit. Let's see if we can make this work.

I understand that you're still a bit tight on budget, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession. I'm offering you the product for $9,750. This is as low as I'm willing to go, considering the value it holds for you.
